alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Lee; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:20PM EDT until June 16 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lee County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 620 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Villages at Sandhill, or 7 miles northeast of Dentsville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Sumter, Forest Acres, Camden, McEntire Air Base, Dentsville, Shaw Air Base, Arcadia Lakes, Lugoff, Hopkins, Oakland, Villages at Sandhill, Elgin, Horrel Hill, Killian, Mulberry, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, Lake Carolina and Fort Jackson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 73 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 7 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
